Uses of Package
edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader.gradebook

Packages that use edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader.gradebook
Package
Description
edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader
This package contains classes that are used to keep track of students, grade projects, and submit assignments for The Joy of Coding.
edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader.canvas
 
edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader.gradebook
 
edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader.gradebook.ui
 
edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader.poa
 
  • Classes in edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader.gradebook used by edu.pdx.cs.joy.grader
    Class
    Description
    Assignment
    This class represents an assignment give to students in The Joy of Coding.
    Assignment.ProjectType
     
    GradeBook
    This class represents a grade book that contains information about an offering of the course: the assignments, the students and their grades.
    Student
    This class represents a student who is taking the course.
